name: Koalanaconda
text:
2 "Koala" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can send this card to the GY; Fusion Summon 1 "Koala" monster by banishing Fusion Materials from your hand, Deck, or GY. If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 other "Koala" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Koalanconda" from your Extra Deck. "Koala" monsters this card points to cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only Summon "Koalanaconda" once per turn.
